releases.title: SAP Fiori 3 Look and Feel for SAP C/4HANA
releases.description: End users see that our products form a coherent picture
businessvalues: Builds consistency for the end user and improves usability of SAP C/4HANA.
Improves user adoption and satisfaction of SAP C/4HANA.
Consistent terminology and placement of actions ensures that end users know where to go next, thereby reducing their cognitive load.
Provides a consistent, coherent and modern user experience for the intelligent suite across SAP C/4HANA  and SAP S/4HANA.

releases.title: Product Recommendations
releases.description: Use Commerce Journey data and Machine Learning to drive highly effective recommendations.
businessvalues: Drive Engagement & Conversion: Ensure customers find products that match their interest. Increase conversion rates and avoid abandoned sessions.
Enable Product Discovery: Boost product visibility and improve inventory navigation with ML-powered product recommendations.
The Control to Curate Relevancy: Retain business control to meet KPI and customer experience goals. Show relevant product categories and blend recommendations with real-time merchandising metrics.

releases.title: SAP Analytics Cloud Integration
releases.description: Analyse and report on your customer identity and consent strategy
businessvalues: Gain a deeper understanding of your identity and consent activity across your business.
Native integration of the SAP Analytics Cloud with the SAP Customer Data Cloud.
From board room to operations, tailor the needs of the report to meet the business requirement.
Optimize your business based on the analysis of current and previous Identity and Consent strategies.

releases.title: Large Scale Data Exposure
releases.description: Accessibility to the data assets of SAP Marketing Cloud enabling the intelligent enterprise
businessvalues: Interface standards are exposed, which enable large scale data consumption.
By opening up data interfaces, machine learning and business intelligence scenarios become possible.

releases.title: Lead-to-Cash
releases.description: Combine experience data and operational data to gain new business insights and reach a new level of customer satisfaction
businessvalues: Retrieve permissions based on contact business roles.
GDPR compliant customer engagement.
Use SAP Customer Data Cloud as a central hub for consent and permission management.

releases.title: SAP C/4HANA Implementation Portal
releases.description: One-stop configuration and integration portal for implementing business scenarios from a business point of view
businessvalues: Enable a unified user experience for creating, updating and testing automated integration configurations across all products within the SAP C/4HANA portfolio.
Business Key User would be able to configure, update, as well as test the functional correctness of a business-related integration configuration.

Enable a business process-driven integration experience rather than the rudimentary mechanism of integrating system to system. This will enable customers to visual landscape integrations from a business point of view.

releases.title: SAP S/4HANA Returns Integration
releases.description: Use returns from SAP S/4HANA to determine the best customers for campaigns
businessvalues: In addition to sales orders, returns are also replicated to SAP Marketing Cloud.
Returns from SAP S/4HANA Order Management can be transformed to interactions in SAP Marketing Cloud with information about the product, the quantity, and the return reason.
SAP Marketing Cloud can, for example, use return data for campaigns to identify customers with a high return rate, or customers who do not return at all.

releases.title: Order Management
releases.description: One central order available for all clouds
businessvalues: A true central record of the order will act as a single source of truth connecting the front office to the back office.
Simplified integration within the suite – all integration can happen with reference to a shared SAP C/4HANA Order ID.
Simplified integration between the suite and the ecosystem – ability to use the same ID across the enterprise as a whole, lowering TCO.
Offer an end to end order process, visible to all clouds.

releases.title: OPP Enhanced Use Cases
releases.description: Support consistent pricing out of the box for all clouds
businessvalues: Support for bundle pricing with SAP Product Configuration allows you to consistently sell configurable products from different touch points.
OPP pre-integrated into SAP Commerce Cloud means your web customers get the same experience as your in-store or field-sales ones.
Additional promotional rules and extensibility will let you improve customer retention and maximize sales with more intelligent pricing.
Integration into other clouds such as SAP Service Cloud, SAP Sales Cloud and Order Management mean all the benefits with additional project time.

releases.title: Customer Order Sourcing Advanced Rules
releases.description: Leverage more advanced sourcing rules to optimize according to more business needs
businessvalues: Optimize your supply based on more attributes. For example fulfill according to cost or margin and maximize profitability.
More rules choices lets business users respond to changing market conditions immediately rather than waiting for a customization project.
Set fulfillment plans for more complex combinations of requirements, accounting for longer-term thinking.
Integrate customer-related attributions into your optimization to delight customers according to their value.

releases.title: Product Master
releases.description: Creating true Product Golden Record combining information from both front office and back office
businessvalues: Delivering a true product golden record which will act as a single source of truth connecting the front office and the back office.
Providing real-time integration, reducing point-to-point connections, not just within SAP C/4HANA Suite but with the backend too.
Open to external world, simplifying extensibility and access to add-on solutions, resulting in overall low TCO.
Built for the future with native cloud architecture.

releases.title: Customer Master
releases.description: Customer master data always up to date and connected across your landscape
businessvalues: Run simple with connected customer records across your front and back office.
Deliver on your promises with pre-configured integration, enabling seamless processes for your customers.
Deeper cross suite flexibility and extensibility, managed simply.
Open to external world, simplifying extensibility and access to add-on solutions, resulting in overall low TCO.

releases.title: SAP C/4HANA Public APIs for Customers and Partners
releases.description: Unified, scalable, extensible and open API framework, enabling SAP customers and partners to streamline publication of business services
businessvalues: A consistent suite experience via all consumption channels.
Focus on the most important APIs, one API technology and pattern
Group APIs logically by domains, not exposing underlaying applications
Unified SAP C/4HANA API with access to core data and functionality for Intelligent Enterprise processes.

releases.title: SAP Open Connector for Firmographic Data Enrichment
releases.description: Leverage firmographic data from third-party data providers to enrich account and contact profiles
businessvalues: Improved account and contact data quality.
More precise identification of ABM target accounts.
Improved targeted account engagement.
featuredetails: Integrate third-party service providers with SAP Open Connectors.
Fetch firmographic data from third party data providers (e.g. address, revenue, # employees).
Customers and partner extensibility to retrieve additional data.

releases.title: Prebuilt application connectivity
releases.description: Harmonize the integration and customization across all SAP products
businessvalues: Supports the extensibility and integration between applications in a cloud-native way using the best available solutions
Provides integration patterns and necessary tooling for establishing a trusted connection between Extension Factory and third-party applications
Provides prebuilt application connectivity with all SAP Products

businessvalues: Choose your provider based on the region you want to server your customers
Leverage SAP standard enterprise support for different flavors of runtimes (Kubernetes/CloudFoundary/ABAP /serverless)

releases.title: Omnichannel Quotation Management with Subscription Products
releases.description: Improved quotation management by including subscription products in SAP CPQ
businessvalues: Seamless integration between SAP Commerce supporting external user facing and SAP Sales Cloud internal sales force.
Accelerate deal cycles, maintain an accurate pipeline, and sell more by managing quotes across any channels and devices.
Support SAP customers with a 360° view of their quotations – consistent with their pipeline management and consistent with their sales force management.
featuredetails: Quote with physical and subscription products.
Generate orders and subscriptions respectively from physical and subscription products.

releases.title: Context-Driven Services Integration with SAP Marketing Cloud
releases.description: Get insights into customer behaviors for better segmentation and campaigning management
businessvalues: Aggregate customer interactions across sessions for better insights.
Analyze the recent views and scores for better offers and recommendations.
featuredetails: Replicate aggregated product views and searches at session level from Context-Driven Services.
Replicate recent views, counts and scores to marketing cloud.

releases.title: SAP Commerce Cloud Spartacus Storefront
releases.description: Native integration to the SAP Commerce Cloud lean, angular-based storefront
businessvalues: Extendable: Spartacus is designed to be upgradable while maintaining full extendibility.
Progressive: Spartacus is on a journey to be fully compliant with the Progressive Web Application (PWA) checklist.
Upgradable: Spartacus code is published and used as libraries and follows semantic versioning conventions.
Native B2C based integration with the leading CIAM for B2C capabilities of the SAP Customer Data Cloud.

releases.title: SAP C/4HANA cockpit
releases.description: Enabling SAP C/4HANA business users and business owners to work with SAP C/4HANA as well next to the administrators and developers
businessvalues: The entry point for Business owners to visualize the high-level KPI of SAP C/4HANA products coming through the Observability feature
The entry point for Business owners to visualize the high-level KPI of SAP C/4HANA products coming through the Observability feature

businessvalues: Customers benefit from a unified user base for all users of the SAP C/4HANA Suite.
Tight integration with SAP C/4HANA internal organizations help providing an extra service and support experience.
Support all modern protocols allowing futureproof architectures, along with the existing SaaS portfolio.
